co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib

Interface DatasetStatePersistor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KVTableStatePersistor

    public interface DatasetStatePersistor
    Defines how some state will be persisted/managed, using a DatasetContext to read and persist state.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void persistState(DatasetContext datasetContext, byte[] state)
      Writes the serialized bytes of the state of the partition consuming process.
      byte[] readState(DatasetContext datasetContext) 

    • Method Detail

      • readState

        @Nullable
byte[] readState(DatasetContext datasetContext)
        Parameters:
        datasetContext - context to use to instantiate dataset(s) for reading the state
        Returns:
        the serialized bytes of the state of the partition consuming process; return null to indicate a fresh state of consuming (defaults to starting from the beginning).

      • persistState

        void persistState(DatasetContext datasetContext,
                byte[] state)
        Writes the serialized bytes of the state of the partition consuming process. The bytes written in this method should be available in the following call to readBytes(DatasetContext).
        Parameters:
        datasetContext - context to use to instantiate dataset(s) for persisting the state
        state - the bytes to persist
